mapper.select: SELECT ms.id, ms.coaching_schedule_id, ms.cancel_yn, cs.possible_date_time FROM mentee_schedule ms JOIN coaching_schedule cs ON ms.coaching_schedule_id = cs.id WHERE mentee_id = #{menteeId} AND cs.possible_date_time BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime};

SELECT ms.id, cs.possible_date_time, fb.id AS feedback_id, fb.coach_feedback, fb.mentee_feedback FROM mentee_schedule ms JOIN coaching_schedule cs ON ms.coaching_schedule_id = cs.id LEFT JOIN feedback fb ON ms.id = fb.mentee_schedule_id WHERE ms.mentee_id = #{menteeId} AND ms.coaching_schedule_id = #{coachingScheduleId};
